section.title: Disable Kerberos TGT Expiration Warning
section.para:
Disables the Solaris Kerberos warning daemon ( ktkt_warnd(1M) ). When this daemon is enabled on Kerberos clients it can warn users when their Kerberos tickets are about to expire, or renew the tickets before they expire.
